TopicTitle: Operation Return to Sender (Sequel is being made)

Articles.Content:
Mission Update:

I ll post the updated version either some time today or tommorow
Oh I look forward to it!

ATTENTION!

The game has been updated

Tank and APC are removed

AA guns range decreased to 1000

AA guns scan time increased to 15

Note: I forgot to remove my fighter from the runway, please remove it.
Excellent. I'll take another shot at this.

I HAVE DONE IT

I finished my own challenge

Aircraft: PG-27 Temple

Armament

16 Hellfire Missiles

4 Maverick Missiles

2 Hydra Rocket Pods

1 Vulcan Gun

First, I fired 6 hellfire missiles at the mission control LMDS

Killed

Next: I went for the West Side AA gun with 3 Maverick Missiles (I really only meant to fire 1)

It was Killed

Also I got hit with an AA missile but managed to survive some how. Did lose nose cone and one rocket pod

Then used rockets to attack a SAMÃ¢â‚¬Â¦it missed

I then shot 6 hellfire at the VAB LMDSÃ¢â‚¬Â¦it failed so I went for a second attack

4 hellfires killed it

Next I went for the east side AA gun

One Maverick missile killed it

I then fired some rockets at 2 SAMs.

Killed one

Using my crafts VTOL Feature, I then used my Vulcan 20mm Gun to finish off the last 3 SAM sites

Results:

Mission Control LMDS

VAB LMDS

SAMs and AA Guns

Mission Accomplished

God Speed

This updated version is a bit easier BTW.

Here is a hint though:

KSC's building can be used to your advantage.

Also does anyone know how to take off poles. I want to add another.

War Eagle I have modded the save that you first game with a 79 part tank, and a 47 part APC and flew it very well. I'll adjust the AA guns in that one as you have and try it once more. Part count before player craft, and changes at 5km of KSC 802 parts, After with the APC, and Tank changes 676 parts, If the Tank and APC is removed there is only 550 parts before player craft.

I'll give it another go on my stream Monday night as i have to go out and get a LOT done during the daytime. Lets just say Real life for me is going to be interesting, and I'll update it more on the stream with what i have found out.

I had been at a stump on designs for a while, and hadn't had a real challenge to force me out of the stump. But this challenge has made me realise something. I am good at making SSTO space planes, so I figured why am I trying to make a pure atmospheric fighter to do this job when I make SSTOs that can do this.

Now that you removed the lag monster tank and APC I can actually get near the KSC without it turning into a slide show I may be able to do the job at hand.

Completed.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

I had 4 CBUs left over that I really didn't need and did most of the damage with the GAU-8.

The lag was so bad taking out the lasers that I didn't get any pictures of that. Which sucks because those were the hardest to kill.
